complaint.description: Vodacom is purposefully avoiding paying clients back through their bot Toby. The customer is unable to speak to a human and the chatbot cannot handle complex issues, making it difficult to claim back money for the company's mistakes.
complaint.suggestion: Vodacom should ensure that customers have access to human support when needed and improve the efficiency and effectiveness of their chatbot.

meta.review_title: Vodacom purposefully avoiding paying clients back through their bot Toby
meta.review_content: Vodacom will not let you speak to a human lately. Toby (I hate bots) can’t handle complex issues especially when you need help in hurry. It comes across as the company’s way of scamming their clients if you can’t claim back your money for their mess ups. Which happen a lot.
